message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's valued at $1500000 to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. My starting price is $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but unfortunately, $1200000 is simply too low for me.  While I understand your perspective, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's try $1300000.  This reflects the significant value of the product and provides us both with a good outcome.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
